description: Creates a static snapshot of your prompt that can be deployed to production. For more information, see Deploy prompts using Prompt management by creating versions in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than one time. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: promptIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the prompt that you want to create a version of.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Any tags that you want to attach to the version of the prompt. For more information, see Tagging resources in Amazon Bedrock. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the version of the prompt.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the prompt was created.

nested_items.name: customerEncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key to encrypt the version of the prompt.

nested_items.name: defaultVariant
nested_items.description: The name of the default variant for the prompt. This value must match the name field in the relevant PromptVariant object.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the version.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the prompt.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the prompt.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the prompt was last updated.

nested_items.name: variants
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each containing details about a variant of the prompt.

nested_items.name: additionalModelRequestFields
nested_items.description: Contains model-specific inference configurations that aren't in the inferenceConfiguration field. To see model-specific inference parameters, see Inference request parameters and response fields for foundation models.

nested_items.name: genAiResource
nested_items.description: Specifies a generative AI resource with which to use the prompt.

nested_items.name: agentIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the agent with which to use the prompt.

nested_items.name: inferenceConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains inference configurations for the prompt variant.

nested_items.name: maxTokens
nested_items.description: The maximum number of tokens to return in the response.

nested_items.name: stopSequences
nested_items.description: A list of strings that define sequences after which the model will stop generating.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: temperature
nested_items.description: Controls the randomness of the response. Choose a lower value for more predictable outputs and a higher value for more surprising outputs.

nested_items.name: topP
nested_items.description: The percentage of most-likely candidates that the model considers for the next token.

nested_items.name: metadata
nested_items.description: An array of objects, each containing a key-value pair that defines a metadata tag and value to attach to a prompt variant.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of a metadata tag for a prompt variant.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of a metadata tag for a prompt variant.

nested_items.name: modelId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the model or inference profile with which to run inference on the prompt.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the prompt variant.

nested_items.name: templateConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains configurations for the prompt template.

nested_items.name: inputVariables
nested_items.description: An array of the variables in the prompt template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the variable.

nested_items.name: messages
nested_items.description: Contains messages in the chat for the prompt.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content in the message.

nested_items.name: cachePoint
nested_items.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a message.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text in the message.

nested_items.name: role
nested_items.description: The role that the message belongs to.

nested_items.name: system
nested_items.description: Contains system prompts to provide context to the model or to describe how it should behave.

nested_items.name: cachePoint
nested_items.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text in the system prompt.

nested_items.name: toolConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration information for the tools that the model can use when generating a response.

nested_items.name: toolChoice
nested_items.description: Defines which tools the model should request when invoked.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the tool.

nested_items.name: tools
nested_items.description: An array of tools to pass to a model.

nested_items.name: cachePoint
nested_items.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the tool.

nested_items.name: inputSchema
nested_items.description: The input schema for the tool.

nested_items.name: json
nested_items.description: A JSON object defining the input schema for the tool.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the tool.

nested_items.name: cachePoint
nested_items.description: A cache checkpoint within a template configuration.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_items.name: inputVariables
nested_items.description: An array of the variables in the prompt template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the variable.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The message for the prompt.

nested_items.name: templateType
nested_items.description: The type of prompt template to use.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the prompt that was created. Versions are numbered incrementally, starting from 1.
